TITLE_MAX60CHAR: ELIXIR All Hands workshop Multitask perturbation modeling for single-cell omics

DESCRIPTION_MAX20WORDS: The aim is to establish best practices in managing research data and pinpoint key areas where the community requires improvements to enhance data FAIRness.
The SCO General Meeting brings all SCO Community members together to strengthen collaboration across countries and plan joint activities for upcoming year.

The 2023 HCA General Meeting will continue progress towards building the first draft of the Human Cell Atlas, including connecting and leveraging diverse communities, reference maps, data assembly and computational efforts.
The meeting brings together members of the ELIXIR community from across the ELIXIR Nodes, and collaborators from partner organisations.

TITLE_MAX60CHAR: Workshop for Single-Cell Omics data analysis trainers
DESCRIPTION_MAX20WORDS: A workshop for SCO data analysis trainers for exchanging ideas about best practices, methods, computational environments, datasets and standards.

TITLE_MAX60CHAR: Our Community's Implementation Study SCONE has started!

DESCRIPTION_MAX20WORDS: Bringing people together to address challenges in cell segmentation for spatial transcriptomics.
An ELIXIR-EMBO course on integrative analysis of single-cell, Visium and ISS data.
